property.description: A control that allows users to enter messages that are handled by the MessageStream module.

Default selected visibility when the macro is displayed.
If not specified, it is determined automatically based on the page where the macro is used.
Valid values are: 'everyone', 'followers', 'group' or 'user'.
Some visibility levels (like 'user' and 'group') accept a parameter. In the case of the 2 mentioned levels, the value can be a serialized reference of a user or a group document.

Comma separated list of visibility options that the macro should allow the user to choose from.
This list should be a sublist of the default ones: 'everyone', 'followers', 'group', 'user'.
